message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $20,000. I think it will be incredibly valuable for you, and this is a very competitive price.

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $14,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget. Is there any wiggle room on the price?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but $20,000 is already a very competitive price for this product.  Could you meet me halfway at $17,000?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $17,000 is still a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider $15,000? I'm really interested in the product and I'm willing to make a serious decision today.
